name: Chicken Sword: Ninja Master
description:
FighFFight like a chicken and become a ninja master! Dash, Slash and Back your way through the 40 Ninja Masteries.

A/D - Move      Space - Jump      J - Sword      K - Dash      H - Hide Info

-------- Alt -------------

Right/Left      Up - Jump      Z - Sword      X - Dash      H - Hide Info
